thread.title: Mark Mathews of The Whatknot Bow Tie Company gives menswear tips: Fashion Flash (photos, video)
thread.title_full: Mark Mathews of The Whatknot Bow Tie Company gives menswear tips: Fashion Flash (photos, video)

author: Allison Carey, The Plain Dealer
title: Mark Mathews of The Whatknot Bow Tie Company gives menswear tips: Fashion Flash (photos, video)
text: Mark Mathews discovered bow ties in 2009 and it didn't take long for him to learn to make them. His Whatknot Bow Tie Company store in the Fifth Street Arcades is thriving. He's got a great understanding of menswear and offers a list of fashion tips.
